scripts.dev: npm run docs:init && concurrently -k -n PYDOC,MINT -c yellow,cyan "npm:docs:watch" "cd docs && mint dev"
scripts.docs:watch: chokidar --await-write-finish --debounce 200 'src/**/*.py' -c 'node scripts/pydoc_onchange.js {path}' & chokidar --debounce 200 'pydoc-markdown.yaml' 'pydoc-markdown.yml' -c 'uv run pydoc-markdown pydoc-markdown.yaml --module vdb-alchemy'
